title: Perfect Square

title: Common Factor

title: Factors
text: In this equation $$z\left({ax}^2+bx+c\right)$$ the square root of a and c are $$4$$ and $$-3$$ respectively.
speech: In this equation  z parentheses, a x squared, plus b x plus c   the square root of a and c are  4  and  negative 3  respectively.

the square root of a and c are   4

title: Plug in
text: Plug into the perfect square simplified form $${z\left(nx+m\right)}^2$$ where $$n$$ is the square root of a and $$m$$ is the square root of c
speech: Plug into the perfect square simplified form  z, parentheses, n x plus m,  squared  where  n  is the square root of a and  m  is the square root of c

is the square root of a and   m
